grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 互換【ゴカン】interchange, transposition, compatible (e.g. PC)
互角【ゴカク】equal (in ability), even, evenly matched, well-matched, on par (with)
kun reading compounds: 互い【たがい】each other, one another
互いに【たがいに】mutually, with each other, reciprocally, together
互に【かたみに】mutually, reciprocally, together
